label: 1000 Handed
description:
This creature can project a plethora of ethereal limbs, allowing it to finely manipulate objects at a significant distance, and even attack with them.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: X Headed
description:
Lists the number of heads the creature possesses, equal to X. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 2 Headed
description:
This creature possesses two heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 4 Headed
description:
This creature possesses four heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 5 Headed
description:
This creature possesses five heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 6 Headed
description:
This creature possesses six heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 7 Headed
description:
This creature possesses seven heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 8 Headed
description:
This creature possesses eight heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 9 Headed
description:
This creature possesses nine heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 10 Headed
description:
This creature possesses ten heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 11 Headed
description:
This creature possesses eleven heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: 3 Headed
description:
This creature possesses twelve heads. Only used for the Multi-headed Ability.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Ace
description: Ace creatures are generally PCs and PC grade creatures. Can be used for bosses, story significant entities, first partner creature etc. Awards more skill points at character creation and possibly other effects.

label: Aero Sense
description:
This creature is capable of feeling vibrations through the air.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Alolan
description:
Denotes if the creature originates from the Alola Region. For @trait[pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Amorphous
description: The creature in question has no fixed shape, allowing it to flex and fit into odd spaces. This creature gains access to the [Amorphous] Tutor List.

label: Aura User
description: This creature is capable of utilising Aura powers beyond the norm. Potentially broadens the use of the Aura Sense skill. Gains access to the [Aura User] Tutor list.

label: Aura
description: Specifies effects that interact with the Aura Phenomenon in some way. Using these effects will always leave behind a Aura Residue detectable by creatures with the [Aura User] trait.

label: Awkward Flyer
description: This creature can fly. Kind of. Just not well. The user's base Flight Score is equal to Base SPD/10 rounded up.

label: Awkward Swimmer
description: This creature can swim. Kind of. Just not well. The user's base Swim Score is equal to Base SPD/10 rounded up.

label: Baby
description:
This creature is appears to resemble a human infant. Usually associated with lower statistics and skills.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Bait
description: Provides a bonus to Track skill checks when used as bait. This bonus is listed on the effect description of the item, otherwise the default bonus is +20.

label: Berry Production
description: As an Easy Natural World Crafting Project, a creature can grow [Berry] gear they are given. The [Berry] is consumed in this process. At the end of 8 Day Spans, the creature gives a yield 2 of the [Berry] on a successful crafting check, +1 additional [Berry] for every DoS. See crafting rules for more details on crafting checks.

label: Bipedal
description: The creature walks on two limbs, standing mostly upright. The user's base Overland Score is equal to Base SPD/10 rounded up.

label: Bladed
description: This creature possesses effective edged limbs, body parts, or tools. Confers [Sharp] to @trait[adaptable] actions, and grants access to the [Bladed] Tutor List.

label: Blindsight X
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is Xm.

label: Blindsight 5
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 5m.

label: Blindsight 10
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 10.

label: Blindsight 15
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 15m.

label: Blindsight 20
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 20m.

label: Blindsight 25
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 25m.

label: Blindsight 30
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 30m.

label: Breathing Bubble
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Breathless
description: This creature does not need to breathe. This does not grant immunity to [Powder] attacks or attacks that have "Gas" in their name.

label: Burrower
description: This creature has Burrow as a Primary Movement Type, with a Base Score generally equal to Base SPD/10.

label: Calming
description:
This creature has the ability to calm others around it.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Chiller
description: This creature is very cooling, preventing Heat Exposure to allies within [Reach].

label: Cloud Surf
description: This creature creates clouds to traverse on, generally granting a Base Flight Score equal to its Overland Movement.

label: Combustion
description:
The creature can act as a heat source for the pruposes of crafting and cooking.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Construct Commander
description: This creature is capable of commanding and controlling constructs which it has created even if they belong to a different trainer.

label: Construct
description:
This creature was created through artificial means. Construct creatures always have an owner. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Cotton Production
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Crab
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Creature
description: Indicates an entity is a creature.

label: Hex Caster
description:
The creature is able to utilize the attack Curse as if it were a [Ghost] type creature. The creature also has a +10 bonus to Occult skill checks when identifying Occult phenomenon.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Cushioned Fall
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Darkvision X
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to Xm.

label: Darkvision 5
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 1m.

label: Darkvision 10
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 10m.

label: Darkvision 15
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 15m.

label: Darkvision 20
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 20m.

label: Darkvision 25
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 25m.

label: Darkvision 30
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 30m.

label: Deafening
description: This creature is capable of being extremely loud, to the point of pain. The user adds the [Sonic] trait to its @trait[adaptable] attacks. As a Simple Action, the creature can spend 4 PP to give its Sonic Attacks +20% Power and a 10% chance to inflict Suppressed 5 on hit for the next 4 Activations. The creature gains access to the [Deafening] Tutor List.

label: Deep Breath
description:
This creature can hold its breath for extended periods of time.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Deep Diver
description:
This creature can withstand the pressure of the deep sea. Not susceptible to Deep Sea Pressure type Exposure.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Delectable
description: This creature is considered particularly desirable as a foodstuff, or as a specific delicacy. There is no social impact for hunting this creature as a food source.

label: Delta Evolution
description: Rayquaza is capable of Mega Evolution when certain conditions are met, without needing to hold a Mega Stone. Rayquaza can use "Mega Evolve!" as a Free Action Interrupt upon resolving Dragon Ascent, or as a Simple Action with Dragon Ascent in its Active List. Unlike other creatures, Rayquaza does not require a partner with a Key Stone to use Mega Evolve, only requiring Dragon Ascent to be on its Active List.

label: Diamond Creation
description:
Once every 10 Day Spans the creature can make a Luck check to generate one Diamond. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Digitize
description: The creature is able to become digital and enter Cyberspace as a Complex Action. While in Cyberspace, the creature has a +20 bonus to their Computers Skill checks. Exiting Cyberspace is a Simple Action.

label: Direction Sense
description: This creature inherently knows it's location, either through innately knowing Magnetic North, some manner of clairvoyance, or some other physical or supernatural means. The creature has a +20 bonus to Navigate Skill checks and always knows which way Magnetic North is.

label: Disaster Predictor
description:
This creature can predict when disasters are going to occur, providing a +10 Luck Bonus to reduce the Danger Clock by 1 Span at the cost of 10 PP. The Danger Clock is always visible to this creature. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: EM Sense X
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within Xm of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 5
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 5m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 10
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 10m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 15
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 15m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 20
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 20m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 10
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 25m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: EM Sense 30
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 30m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: Emotion Eraser
description:
This creature is capable of removing others' ability to feel emotions. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Fermenter
description: The creature turns equipped [Berry] items turn into Berry Juice after 6 Day Spans. Equipped Berry Juice is turned into Pungent Juice after 10 Day Spans.

label: Forme Change
description: This creature is capable of changing Formes. Most creatures have specific Triggers, listed in other Traits or Abilities. Sometimes, this requires to overriding of the user's species with a Temporary Species.

label: Fossil
description: Indicates this creature was revived from a fossil.

label: Fully Evolved
description: Indicates a fully evolved creature.

label: Galarian
description:
Denotes if the creature originates from the Galar Region. For @trait[pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Gestalt
description:
Refers to creatures that are multiple bodies sharing one mind.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Gilled
description: This creature is able to breathe underwater, ignoring the conditions for Drowning.

label: Glow X
description: This creature illuminates an area in a Xm Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 1
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 1m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 2
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 3m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 3
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 3m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 4
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 4m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 5
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 5m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 6
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 6m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 7
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 7m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 8
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 8m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 9
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 9m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 10
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 10m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 11
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 11m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Glow 12
description: This creature illuminates an area in a 12m Burst while it is active and not Fainted.

label: Grotesque Fusion
description:
As an Exploration or Downtime Action, the user can choose to expel an absorbed Reshiram or Zekrom from its body, changing to its normal Forme. This can also be accomplished the use of an external mechanical (such as the DNA Splicers Item) or magical method applied to the user as part of an Exploration or Downtime Action.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Heater
description: This creature emits heat, preventing Cold Exposure. Can potentially make Heat Exposure worse.

label: Herb Production
description:
As an Easy Natural World Crafting Project, a creature can grow [Herbal] gear they are given. The [Herbal] is consumed in this process. At the end of 8 Day Spans, the creature gives a yield 2 of the [Herbal] on a successful crafting check, +1 additional [Herbal] for every DoS. See crafting rules for more details on crafting checks.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Hollow Husk
description:
Through the use of an external mechanical (such as the DNA Splicers Item) or magical method as part of an Exploration or Downtime Action on the user, the user can absorb a Reshiram or Zekrom into its body, equipped the creature as a [Belt] item, and changes the user's Forme to White or Black.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Honey Gather
description:
This creature is very adept at gathering Honey, and gaining +1 Degree of Success on successful Skill Checks to find Honey, and failures count as 1 DoS. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: legless
description:
This creature has no legs, and must hop, roll, or drag itself in order to use its Overland Movement. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Horned
description: This creature possesses a prominent horn or spike. Confers [Horn] to @trait[adaptable] actions. Grants access to the [Horn] Tutor list.

label: Hostile Dynamax
description:
This creature radiates Galar Energy, able to direct it toward other creatures or siphon it away from its surroundings into itself. This creature, through some strain, can cause a @trait[pokemon] creature to enter or revert from a Dynamax state.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Hover
description: This creature naturally floats, granting immunity to damage and effects from [Earthbound] actions. Does not crash if its deliberate flight is interrupted.

label: Human
description:
Indicates an creature is Human, locks any human-only perks.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Hyperspace Tunneler
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Ice Controller
description: This creature can control and form ice.

label: Ice Stallion
description:
This creature may create ice around its feet, both as it's about to take a step or in the wake of its movement. It is able to cross over liquids with its Overland Movement Allowance as per [Waterwalker], creating temporary ice sheets on the surface of the liquid to do so. These ice sheets allow other creatures to cross the liquid for a limited time frame. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Illusionist
description: This creature can create realistic illusions as a Complex Action and 5 PP within 10m, or use an illusion to disguise themselves as another creature or an object. Illusions can deal no damage with attacks, and cannot apply effects from attacks. A creature can use a Hard Spot Hidden check to detect an illusion. Creatures with [Aura Sense] automatically succeed on Spot Hidden checks to detect illusions.

label: Incarnate
description: This creature is in a harnessed, humanoid Forme, conferring intelligence and restraint on their powers. The use of a Reveal Glass transforms this creature into its [Therian] Forme.

label: Incubator
description: This creature is able to advance an Egg's clock by two Spans instead of one.

label: Inflatable
description: This creature is able to increase their size. By spending 2 PP, the user can add or remove the Enlarge affliction from itself.

label: Interdimensional
description:
This creature is capable of interdimensional travel.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Invisibility
description: This creature is capable of turning themselves Invisible using a Complex Action and 5 PP.

label: IR Vision X
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from Xm away.

label: IR Vision 5
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 5m away.

label: IR Vision 10
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 10m away.

label: IR Vision 15
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 15m away.

label: IR Vision 20
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 20m away.

label: IR Vision 25
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 25m away.

label: IR Vision 30
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 30m away.

label: Jet
description:
This trait identifies an exceptionally fast flyer or swimmer.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Keen Scent
description:
The creature gains a +30 bonus to Track Skill checks when following a scent trail. The creature can follow a scent trail for 5 Day Spans before requiring a new check. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Legendary
description: Indicates this creature is a Legendary creature.

label: Lifesense X
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a Xm radius.

label: Lifesense 5
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 5m radius.

label: Lifesense 10
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 10m radius.

label: Lifesense 15
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 15m radius.

label: Lifesense 20
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 20m radius.

label: Lifesense 25
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 25m radius.

label: Lifesense 30
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 30m radius.

label: Light Sensitive
description: May become dazzled and suffer penalties when exposed to bright light.

label: Living Prison
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Living Weapon
description:
The creature can be used as a [Held] item. When used this way, the creature has a Struggle and Fling Power equal to 10+(Highest Attacking Stat/10) and 90 Accuracy. 
The wielder can use attakcs on the [Held] creatures Known Attack List as if they know the Attack themselves, using the better of the two's attacking stats for damaging attacks. Using attacks in this way still consumes the [Held] creatures PP.
The [Held] creature can use attacks from the wielder's Known Attack List as if they know the Attack themselves, using the better of the two's attacking stats for damaging attacks. Using attacks in this way still consumes the [Held] creaures PP.

label: Lockjaw
description: The creature's [Jaw] attacks have the [Grapple] trait. The creature has access to the [Jaw] tutor list.

label: Lumbering
description:
This creature has a movement speed that is slower than normal for their characteristics, varying from creature to creature.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Magnetic
description: The creature has a +30 bonus to Spot Checks to locate hidden [Treasure] items as a Camp Activity. The creature may use Overland movement to traverse metal surfaces with no skill checks.

label: Many Legged
description: The creature has a lot of legs beyond the normal two or four.

label: Medium
description:
Aura-adjacent trait. Allows the creature to communicate with the dead. Does not cover Ghost-Type creatures.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Mega Stone Conversion
description:
This creature may pour their dense life energy into evolution stones, embuing them with the power of Mega Evolution. As a Crafting Project, the user (Challenging, Occult: Legendary) may craft a Mega Stone, matching a %lt;Type&gt the [Evolution] item possesses and <Species> of a Mega Evolution-elligible creature nearby it. Otherwise, the creature may choose to craft a Mega Stone, the <Species> selected from all elligible creatures of any %lt;Type&gt the item possesses.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Memory Eraser
description:
This creature is capable of erasing others' memories.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Milk Production
description: Once every 5 Day Spans the creature produces a Stack of Moomoo Milk.

label: Mimic
description: This creature is capable of mimicking human speech and other creature's cries. Grants a +20 bonus to Disguise checks when impersonating another creature vocally.

label: Mind Lock
description: The creature is immune to [Telepath] and resists attempts to be manipulated though Social Skill Checks. The creature's default Tension clock is 1 Span smaller.

label: Mind Reader
description: This creature can sense thoughts or feelings.

label: Mud Runner
description:
Is not impaired by muddy terrain.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Multitype Perks
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Mushroom Harvest
description: Once every 5 Day Spans the creature produces a random [Mushroom] up to its Grade.

label: Musical
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Natural Backpack
description: Creature with a natural storage pouch for transporting gear. The creature has +1 additional [Belt] slots.

label: Nectar Forme
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Noisy
description: This creature, either through its body or through its voice, is fairly loud. The creature receives -20 to Stealth Checks if they're utilizing whatever it is that makes them noisy (Kommo'o moving vigorously and clattering its scales, Vibrava flying and causing its wings to buzz loudly, etc.). The creature gains access to the [Noisy] Tutor List.

label: Original One
description: This creature is capable of incredibly powerful feats such as bringing back things that it once destroyed, making certain things vanish into thin air, halting time, splitting itself in two, and overturning the very laws of nature. The user may use its Science (All) skill in place of any other Skill.

label: Pack Leader
description:
A trait that will be acquired via perks. Will allow to coordinate Packs more effectively.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Pack Mon
description:
Serves as a trigger trait for Pack perks and mechanics.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Paldean
description:
Denotes if the creature originates from the Paldea Region. For @trait[pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Paradox Sense
description: This creature can naturally sense the presence of [Paradox] creatures. The creature innately knows the general location of [Paradox] creatures in the current dimension it resides.

label: Paradox
description: A trait used to identify Paradox creature and similar entities.

label: Pearl Creation
description: The creature produces Pearl treasure once every 10 Day Spans.

label: Phasing
description: This creature ignores and passes through Blocking Terrain when using movement. If the creature ends its movement inside of Blocking Terrain, it is forced into the nearest available space and loses 3 ticks of HP for every meter it was forced to move.

label: Phoenix
description:
This creature can only be killed temporarily. Will revive naturally after a while.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Plant Grower
description: The creature can make plants fully mature within 1 Day Span as a Camp Activity. This can be used to reduce the Project Clocks for [Berry Production] and [Herb Production] by 1 Day Span. Plant Grower can be used only once per target per Day Span.

label: Pokebot
description:
Relates to the Pokebot template.
TO BE DETERMINED

label: Premonition
description:
This creature can glimpse the future. The creature can spend 4 PP, providing a +20 Occult or Navigate Bonus to reduce the Danger Clock by 1 Span. The Danger Clock is always visible to this creature. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Propulsion
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Psychic Radar
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Rapid
description:
These creatures move extremely quickly, their Movement Scores increased by 1.5x their standard speeds (or more!).
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Reach
description: With the help of gangly limbs, longer appendages, or vines and the like, the user has a longer reach. The user's Physical Reach is doubled.

label: Royal Carbink
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Semi Bipedal
description: This refers to Bipedal creatures than can traverse on their four limbs as needed. Generally, this causes the creature's base Movement Scores to be increased by 1.25x.

label: Serpentine
description:
This creature has a snake-like body.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Shadow Meld
description: While in darkness, or in an area with sufficient cover, this creature can spend one Simple Action and 5 PP to gain Invisible.

label: Shadow Purification
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Shapeshifter
description: Capable of changing shape to look like other creatures and objects by spending one Complex Action. This doesn't change the creatures traits, abilities, or attacks. The creature has a bonus +30 to Disguise skill checks while they are disguised through Shapechanger.

label: Shrinkable
description: This creature is able to reduce their size. By spending 2 PP, the user can add or remove the Shrink affliction from itself.

label: Silent
description: This creature is capable of moving without making a sound. Listen checks to detect this creature are Almost Impossible.

label: Slippery
description: This creature is hard to pin down, and makes Grapple checks against them Intense. If this creature is affected by Grapple, they have a +30 bonus to escape the Grapple.

label: Slumbering Statue
description:
Zacian/Zamazenta unique trait. Able to turn into statues/gargoyles to hibernate/slumber.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Speech
description: This creature is capable of coherent speech. Can be awarded to PCs with the [Creature] trait in games that include Human characters.

label: Spirit Traveler
description:
This creature is capable of turning into a spirit and temporarily leaving its body.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Split Evolution
description: Indicates this creature can evolve into more than one option.

label: Steel Officer
description:
Leadership checks made to influence this creature suffer -20 for creatures with the [Steel Pawn] trait, and +30 for creatures with the [Steel Shogun] Trait.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Steel Pawn
description:
Leadership checks made to influence this creature gain +20 for creatures with the [Steel Officer] trait, and +50 for creatures with the [Steel Shogun] Trait.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Steel Shogun
description:
This creature cannot be targeted by Leadership checks from creatures with the [Steel Pawn] and [Steel Officer] traits.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Stormcaller
description: This creature can create or clear stormy conditions. The user has access to the [Stormcaller] Tutor List.

label: Telekinetic X
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range X / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 2
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 2 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 4
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 4 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 6
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 6 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 8
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 8 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 10
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 10 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telekinetic 12
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range 12 / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telepath
description:
This creature is able to communicate telepathically. The creature gains the Attack Mind Reader as a Learned Attack, and can use the Mind Reading Action. 
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Teleport
description: Pertaining to Moves and actions that involve Teleportation.

label: Teleporter
description: This creature gains Teleporting movement equal to their highest movement score. The creature gains the Teleport attack as a Learned Attack.

label: Therian
description: This creature is in a unbound, bestial Forme. This removes the restraints on the user's powers, and engaging in combat may drive the creature into a furious rampage. The use of a Reveal Glass transforms this creature into its [Therian] Forme.

label: Time Controller
description:
This creature is capable of controlling time.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Time Traveller
description:
This creature can time-travel. This is a powerful narrative ability and needs to be well regulated.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Tox Cleanse
description:
This creature is capable of removing pollution and poisons out of the natural environment and creatures living there over the course of a Span whilst camping.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Treasure Of Ruin
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Tremorsense X
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to Xm.

label: Tremorsense 5
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 5m.

label: Tremorsense 10
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 10m.

label: Tremorsense 15
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 15m.

label: Tremorsense 20
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 20m.

label: Tremorsense 25
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 25m.

label: Tremorsense 30
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 30m.

label: Truth Reflect
description: This creature is capable of showing the truth in its reflection after being polished.

label: Ultra Beast
description:
This creature has been flung through Ultra Space, and appear to resonate in one form or another with Z-Energy. These creatures tend to be quite formidable. These creatures also possess [Ultra].
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Ultra Burst
description:
This creature is in a unique Forme after ingesting colossal amounts of energy. The creature consumes a large amount of energy to maintain this Forme, consuming 8 Ticks of PP per Daytime Span spent in the Forme, and 1 Tick of PP per Danger Span accumulated.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Ultra Wormhole
description:
This creature is capable of breaking the barrier between the current universe/dimension and Ultra Space, opening and closing Ultra Wormholes in exchange for 10 PP. They may traverse the interdimensional void with the Movement Allowance of their choice, protecting creatures within a 3m radius from the void's hazards and propelling them alongside the user through the void.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Ultra
description: A trait used to identify creatures whom traversed Ultra Space, or originate from the interdimensional void itself.

label: Underdog
description:
An creature with lower base stats, making them eligible for Underdog perks.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Unown Choir
description:
The Unown are able to do a lot of weird shit when they sing together.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Volatile Bomb
description: This creature is known to explode voluntarily and does not gain Weary from Fainting after using [Explode] attacks. The creature has access to the [Explode] tutor list.

label: Wallclimber
description: This creature may use their Overland Movement to move along walls, and may hang in place. Climb checks may be required if under duress.

label: Water Locator
description:
This creature is capable of locating clean water.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Water Purity
description:
This creature can naturally purify water on contact.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Waterwalker
description:
This creature may choose to walk on water instead of swimming in it. They may stand on the surface of water and more across it using their Overland Movement Allowance, rather than Swim.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Wavesense X
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to Xm.

label: Wavesense 5
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 5m.

label: Wavesense 10
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 10m.

label: Wavesense 15
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 15m.

label: Wavesense 20
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 20m.

label: Wavesense 25
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 25m.

label: Wavesense 30
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 30m.

label: Weapon Training
description: This creature is trained in the use of human-made weaponry.

label: Weapon
description: This trait applies to weapons and weapon-interactive moves.

label: Weathervane
description:
The creature changes Forme depending on the most recent Weather, changing %lt;Type&gt and granting the appropriate <Adaptable Type> Trait.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Wielder
description: This creature receives a Wielded/Held Item slot for free.

label: Willpower Eraser
description:
This creature is capable of removing others' willpower and motivation.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Winged
description:
This creature gains a flying speed by way of wings, requiring exertion to continue flight. Grants access to the [Winged] Tutor List.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Wool Production
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: X Ray Vision
description:
This creature can see through walls.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Z Crystal Creation
description: The creature's body can shed prismatic shards that are capable of drawing, storing, and unleashing massive quanities of energy. As a Crafting Project, the user (Challenging, Occult: Legendary) or the creature that's responsible for them (Hard Husbandry) can craft a Z-Crystal or Z-Power-Crystal, matching the %lt;Type&gt of a creature nearby it or with the %lt;Type&gt and <Species> of a creature nearby it in the case of a Z-Power-Crystal. Otherwise, a variant of either variety of Crystal is rolled and generated randomly.

label: Tera Power
description: This creature emanates Terastal Energy, able to direct it toward other creatures or siphon it away from its surroundings into itself. This creature, through great strain, can induce Terastallization in @trait[pokemon].

label: Stellar
description: This creature may assume a heightened Forme when exposed to a Tera Orb, causing it to bristle with Stellar power. While in Stellar Forme, the user's control of Terastal Energy expands and is refined. The user may manipulate Terastal Energy to deactivate other creatures' Terastallization and even create physical constructs with it, such as walls and barriers.

label: Creepy Crawly
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Bug-Type.

label: Evil Touch
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Dark-Type.

label: Drakelike
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Dragon-Type.

label: Zapper
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Electric-Type.

label: Sparkler
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fairy-Type.

label: Well Built
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fighting-Type.

label: Firestarter
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fire-Type.

label: Guster
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Flying-Type.

label: Spooky
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ghost-Type.

label: Floratic
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Grass-Type.

label: Fictile
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ground-Type.

label: Freezer
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ice-Type.

label: Generalizer
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Normal-Type.

label: Emitter
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Nuclear-Type.

label: Venomous
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Poison-Type.

label: Psycher
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Psychic-Type.

label: Lithic
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Rock-Type.

label: Malevolent
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Shadow-Type.

label: Natural Steel
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Steel-Type.

label: Fountain
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift @trait[adaptable] actions and attacks to the Water-Type.

label: Stack X
description: Denotes the number of stacks

label: Belt
description: Denotes an item stored in the Belt equipment slot.

label: Fling
description: Denotes if an item can be used as part of the Fling attack action.

label: X-Strike
description: Denotes if an action hits multiple times. Attacks with X<5 rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) X times against up to X targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time. Attacks with X>5 rolls the Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d(X-1), damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 2-Strike
description: Rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) 2 times against up to 2 targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time.

label: 3-Strike
description: Rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) 3 times against up to 3 targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time.

label: 4-Strike
description: Rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) 4 times against up to 4 targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time.

label: 5-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d4. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 6-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d5. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 7-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d6. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 8-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d7. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 9-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d8. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 10-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d9. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 11-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d10. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 12-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d11. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 13-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d12. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 14-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d13. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 15-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d14. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 16-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d15. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 17-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d16. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 18-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d18. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 19-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d18. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 20-Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d19. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: Adaptable
description: Means that an attack or action can be Type-Shifted based on other Traits.

label: Arcane
description: Denotes magical actions.

label: Basic
description: Means than an attack or action is simple/reliable, generally associated with a low PP Cost.

label: Blast X
description: Utilized with ranged attacks and effects. Affects entities within a X.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 1
description: Affects entities within a 1.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 2
description: Affects entities within a 2.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 3
description: Affects entities within a 3.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 4
description: Affects entities within a 4.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 5
description: Affects entities within a 5.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 6
description: Affects entities within a 6.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 7
description: Affects entities within a 7.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 8
description: Affects entities within a 8.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 9
description: Affects entities within a 9.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 10
description: Affects entities within a 10.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 11
description: Affects entities within a 11.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 12
description: Affects entities within a 12.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Bone
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a bone or ossified item or appendage.

label: Contact
description: Denotes if a creature makes contract with its target through using the associated action or attack.

label: Crash 1/2
description: On miss, the user takes damage equal to half the amount the attack would have dealt to the target.

label: Crit 1
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +1 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crit 2
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +2 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crit 3
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +3 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crit 4
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +4 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crushing
description: The associated action/attack deals double damage to and have +20 Accuracy against creatures that are Shrinked, or creatures with a CatMod that are 3 or more lower than the user.

label: Curl
description: Denotes actions/attacks that require the user to curl their body into a ball or another round shape.

label: Dance
description: Denotes actions/attacks that utilize dancing.

label: Danger Close
description: These attacks bypass the Accuracy Check within the first Range Increment, and start at 100 Accuracy from the second Band onward.

label: Dash
description: Declaring these attacks allow the user to freely use Rush, but cannot be used if the user is Bound.

label: Defensive
description: Denotes a defensive attack/ability.

label: Defrost
description: Declaring these attacks reduces the user's Frozen Stacks by 2.

label: Drain X
description: On hit, the user heals X of the amount the attack deals to a creature. X is usually a fraction.

label: Drain 1/16
description: On hit, the user heals 1/16 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1/4
description: On hit, the user heals 1/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1/3
description: On hit, the user heals 1/3 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1/2
description: On hit, the user heals 1/2 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 3/4
description: On hit, the user heals 3/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Draw In
description: The attack/ability draws in other attacks and abilities within a specific range or meeting specific criteria

label: Earthbound
description: The attack/ability hits all creatures in area-of-effect, so long as the area-of-effect affects surfaces/objects are connected or touching, so a creature sitting on a tree branch is hit if a creature on the ground below is targeted and the tree itself is in the affected area. Attacks with this trait are one step more effective against creatures with the Grounded Affliction.

label: Environ
description: Denotes if an attack/ability is affected by or interacts with [Weather] or [Terrain] effects.

label: Execute
description: On hit, an affected creature has their HP reduced to zero.

label: Exhaust
description: This attack consumes a Simple Action on the user's next activation.

label: Explode
description: Denotes if an attack/ability consists of an explosion of some kind.

label: Field
description: Denotes if an attack has a particular use out of combat.

label: Friendly
description: These actions and attacks do not affect allied creatures in range.

label: Hazard
description:
Denotes if an attack/ability/effect creates or interacts with Hazards. Hazards are usually static objects occupying a single space on the ground or another surface that cause detrimental effects when a creature passes through that space. Hazards last the duration of a combat unless destroyed prematurely or otherwise specified in their source's effect.
One such effect that can remove Hazards prematurely is the @UUID[Compendium.ptr2e.core-moves.Item.ypqvBMddHC2zIDib]{Sweep Action}

label: Healing
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with healing the user or others.

label: Horn
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a horn or a similar prominent pointy appendage.

label: Interrupt 1
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "1", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 2
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "2", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 3
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "3", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 4
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "4", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 5
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "5", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 6
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "6", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Interrupt 7
description: This Action may be used as an Interrupt at hierachy tier "7", provided the conditions to using the Interrupt are met.

label: Jaw
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes the user's mouth/teeth.

label: Kick
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes at least one of the user's feet.

label: Light
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes or produces light.

label: Linked
description: Denotes if an attack is linked to the use of another. Linked attacks are automatically added to the Active List, ignoring the Active List limit.

label: Manipulate
description: Denotes if an action or attack manipulates another creature or object.

label: Mascot
description: Denotes powerful or useful attacks/abilities, generally only obtainable by a creature that has obtained a strong bond with comrades, a mentor, and/or a Trainer.

label: Max
description: These attacks deal 1/4 of the damage they would deal if they are negated by a @trait[shield] effect and apply their secondary effects. These attacks also possess [Danger Close] and [Smite]. These attacks may only be used while Dynamaxed/Gigantimaxed/Eternamaxed.

label: Melee
description: Denotes attacks utilized by Melee Weapons. These attacks also possess @trait[contact].

label: Missile
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a discrete, high-speed projectile.

label: Move Locked
description: Denotes if an attack is species-exclusive. Move-Locked attacks are automatically added to the Active List, ignoring the Active List limit.

label: Pass X
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to X creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 1
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 1 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 2
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 2 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 3
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 3 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 4
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 4 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 5
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 5 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 6
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 6 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 7
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 7 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 8
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 8 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 9
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 9 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 10
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 10 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 11
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 11 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 12
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 12 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 13
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 13 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 14
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 14 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 15
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 15 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pledge
description: Denotes a special pledge attack, which increases in intensity and may produce a [Pledge Combo] when used in tandem with another pledge attack.

label: Pledge Combo
description: Denotes a special combination attack, triggering from the combined use of a specific pairing of [Pledge] attacks.

label: Powder
description: Denotes if an attack or ability spreads or uses powder or a fine dust.

label: Priority X
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced X0%.

label: Priority 1
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced 10%.

label: Priority 2
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced 20%.

label: Priority 3
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced 30%.

label: Priority 4
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced 40%.

label: Priority 5
description: After resolving this Action, the user's next Activation is advanced 50%.

label: Pulse
description: Denotes if an attack or ability expels a wave of energy.

label: Punch
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes at least one of the user's hands.

label: Push X
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures Xm away from the user.

label: Push 1
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 1m away from the user.

label: Push 2
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 2m away from the user.

label: Push 3
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 3m away from the user.

label: Push 4
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 4m away from the user.

label: Push 5
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 5m away from the user.

label: Push 6
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 6m away from the user.

label: Push 7
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 7m away from the user.

label: Push 8
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 8m away from the user.

label: Push 9
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 9m away from the user.

label: Push 10
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 10m away from the user.

label: Push 11
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 11m away from the user.

label: Push 12
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 12m away from the user.

label: Push 13
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 13m away from the user.

label: Push 14
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 14m away from the user.

label: Push 15
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 15m away from the user.

label: Push 16
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 16m away from the user.

label: Push 17
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 17m away from the user.

label: Push 18
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 15m away from the user.

label: Push 19
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 19m away from the user.

label: Push 20
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 20m away from the user.

label: Ranged
description: Denotes attacks utilized by Ranged Weapons.

label: Ray
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a precise beam of energy.

label: Recoil-X
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to X of the amount the attack deals to a creature. X is usually a fraction.

label: Recoil 1/8
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/8 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1/4
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1/3
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/3 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1/2
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/2 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to the full amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Room
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with Rooms. Rooms apply their effects to all creatures on the Field.

label: Set-Up
description: The action has a two-step activation and resolution, split across two activations (Set-Up and Resolution) and consumes Complex Actions on both Activations, but PP only once. It may have separate effects on both the set up activation and resolution activation, though usually the attack's accuracy and damage roll occur on the resolution activation.

label: Sharp
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a sharp, edged limb or weapon.

label: Shield
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect provides a shielding function.

label: Shrink
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect provides an effect that reduces a creature's Size Category.

label: Sky
description: The attack's area of effect extends vertically, up to the nearest ceiling and down to the nearest surface (max 20m each direction)

label: Social
description: Denotes if an attack or ability features social interaction.

label: Sonic
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes sound.

label: Substitute
description: Denotes if an attack or ability creates a Substitute or similar mitigating method.

label: Tail
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a tail or a similar lengthy appendage.

label: Terrain
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with Terrains. Terrains apply their effects to all creatures on the Field that are in contact with a surface, while creatures in the air or in a liquid (whether floating/ traversing naturally or by some other effect) are not affected.

label: Transform
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect Transforms the user.

label: Trap
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect traps creatures, usually via the Bound Affliction.

label: Unreliable
description: This attack's Accuracy is equal to 30+User Level-Target Level, and is unmodified by and ignores all other changes to actions' Accuracy or the target's Evasion.

label: Weather
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with Weathers.

label: Wind
description: Denotes if an attack or ability interacts with or utilizes Wind.

label: Zenith
description: These attacks deal 1/4 of the damage they would deal if they are negated by a @trait[shield] effect.

label: Connection
description: Denotes if an Ability provides an Action or Attack onto a creature's Active List, not taking up a slot on the user's Active List.

label: Fusion
description: Denotes if an Ability governs a fusion between 2 or more creatures.

label: Innate
description: This Ability cannot be copied, removed, or nullified.

label: Major Affliction
description:
Denotes is an effect is a Major Status Affliction. Major Status Afflictions are proposed to not have Stacks, and persist into Exploration and Downtime if left untreated.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Minor Affliction
description:
Denotes is an effect is a Minor Status Affliction. Minor Status Afflictions are more temporary or tactical in nature, rather than strict "afflictions" like the Major Afflictions tend to be.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Pseudo Affliction
description:
Denotes is an effect is a Pseudo Status Affliction. Pseudo Status Afflictions are more positive in nature, or break other conventions associated with Major and Minor Status Afflictions.
SUBJECT TO CHANGE

label: Stage change
description: Denotes if an effect alters a creature's Stat stages.

label: Desperation X
description: An effect activates when the user's health is below X of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. For Gear, such as Berries, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Desperation X].

label: Desperation 1/2
description: An effect activates when the user's health is below 1/2 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. For Gear, such as Berries, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Desperation 1/2].

label: Desperation 1/3
description: An effect activates when the user's health is below 1/3 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. For Gear, such as Berries, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Desperation 1/3].

label: Desperation 1/4
description: An effect activates when the user's health is below 1/4 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. For Gear, such as Berries, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Desperation 1/4].

label: Desperation 3/4
description: An effect activates when the user's health is below 3/4 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. For Gear, such as Berries, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Desperation 3/4].

label: Intrepid X
description: An effect activates when the user's health is above X of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. for Gear, such as Armor, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Intrepid X].

label: Intrepid 1/2
description: An effect activates when the user's health is above 1/2 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. for Gear, such as Armor, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Intrepid 1/2].

label: Intrepid 1/3
description: An effect activates when the user's health is above 1/3 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. for Gear, such as Armor, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Intrepid 1/3].

label: Intrepid 1/4
description: An effect activates when the user's health is above 1/4 of their Max 1/4 HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. for Gear, such as Armor, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Intrepid 1/4].

label: Intrepid 3/4
description: An effect activates when the user's health is above 3/4 of their Max HP. The effect is usually listed in the source's effect descripion. for Gear, such as Armor, this means they can only be used when meeting the trigger conditions for [Intrepid 3/4].

label: Bug
description: This represents the Bug Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Dark
description: This represents the Dark Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures are unaffected by Status-category attacks or effects that possess [Priority X].

label: Dragon
description: This represents the Dragon Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Electric
description: This represents the Electric Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Paralysis and are immune to the negative effects of Electric-Type [Hazard] effects.

label: Fairy
description: This represents the Fairy Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Fighting
description: This represents the Fighting Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Fire
description: This represents the Fire Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Burn.

label: Flying
description: This represents the Flying Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). Flying-Type creatures lose their immunity to Ground-Type attacks that possess the [Contact], [Missile], [Ray], and [Pulse] Traits, with these attacks instead dealing neutral damage, while [Earthbound] attacks are instead resisted.

label: Ghost
description: This represents the Ghost Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Stuck.

label: Grass
description: This represents the Grass Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Leech are unaffected by [Powder] attacks and effects.

label: Ground
description: This represents the Ground Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures are immune to the negative effects of Dusty [Weather].

label: Ice
description: This represents the Ice Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Frozen and are immune to the negative effects of Ice-Type [Hazard] effects.

label: Normal
description: This represents the Normal Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Nuclear
description: This represents the Nuclear Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Poison
description: This represents the Poison Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Poison or Blight and are immune to the negative effects of Poison-Type [Hazard] effects.

label: Psychic
description: This represents the Psychic Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Rock
description: This represents the Rock Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Steel
description: This represents the Steel Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle). These creatures cannot gain Poison or Blight.

label: Water
description: This represents the Water Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Shadow
description: This represents the Shadow Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Aberrant
description: This represents the Aberrant Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Radiant
description: This represents the Radiant Type. When on creatures, it grants access to the Type's Tutor List. When on Items, it confers the Type to the Item's Fling characteristics and to the @trait[adaptable] Actions provided by the Item (including the user's own Struggle).

label: Type Shift
description: Denotes if an Ability can change Attack's Type to the %lt;Type&gt Trait the Ability possesses.

label: Domain
description: Denotes if an Ability provides an Offensive or Allied Aura, based on the Ability's %lt;Type&gt Trait..

label: Hunter
description: Denotes if an Ability provides the user with the capability of doing extra damage to creatures of the %lt;Type&gt Trait this Ability possesses.

label: STAB
description: Denotes if an Ability provides a 50% boost to Attacks of a given %lt;Type&gt Trait, akin to the Same Type Attack Bonus.

label: Strategist
description: Denotes if an Ability provides a unique effect to Attacks and Actions that share the %lt;Type&gt Trait this Ability possesses.

label: Switch Grip
description: One-handed: can hold item in one hand, and another held item in the other hand. Two-handed: power of weapon attacks +30%, loses second held item slot

label: Reload
description: These weapons can only use their innate PP Pool for their attacks. The user can use a Simple Action to reload the weapon, refilling its PP Pool. This Action either consumes an Ammunition item relating to the weapon, or consumes the Character's IP at an increased cost.

label: Pokemon
description: This is a Pokemon.

label: Masked Oni
description: The creature has a special bond with a number of masks, ones that are specifically crafted with Tera Crystals. The creature may draw power from these masks in order to Terastallize.

label: Grapple
description: Denotes if an Action can be utilized while the Action's user is affected by the Grapple affliction.

label: Pierce
description: Denotes if an Action clears [Shield] effects on affected target(s). This happens when the Action hits the target(s) and before damage and other on-hit effects from the Action occur.

label: Phenomenon
description: Denotes if an Item, Ability, or Effect relates to the various transformational phenomena, ie Mega Evolution.

label: Style
description: This Action is a Style. Style Actions apply a @trait[pseudo-affliction] on the user, or the user may spend +2 PP to apply the effect to an allied creature in range. When a [Style] with a different name is applied to a creature that already possesses a [Style] effect, the existing effect is replaced with the new effect.

label: Modification
description: Whenever you declare an Attack, you can modify the Attack with this effect, by paying the appropriate PP cost listed in the [Modification]'s Effect, after which you apply the [Modification]'s Effect to this Attack before it continues to resolve. You cannot declare multiple Modification effects in response to a single declared Attack.

label: Command
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Evolution
description: TO BE DETERMINED

label: Closed-Heart
description:
Creatures with this Trait possess a heart that's been forcefully closed, gaining the following changes:
1) +50% SPD
2) The Extra Abilities "Hyper Agressive" and "Coldhearted"
3) +1 Active List Slot
4) Access to the [Shadow] %lt;Type&gt Learnlist
5) The Anguish Skill (100 by default) and its associated mechanics
6) Are susceptible to the "Hyper Mode" Affliction
7) Cannot undergo Evolution or other miscellaneous transformations
8. Placed onto a slower EXP Track, based on their Species

label: PP Updated
description:
This action has had it's PP Errata'd, any action lacking this trait still has to undergo the PP Errata.
Once all actions have been errata'd this trait will be removed.
